title: Grace and the Drawl Invasion of Earth
description: In the final volume of the Grace trilogy, the Drawl push through and invade the human dimension. Now Grace stands shoulder to shoulder with her kind as they face their greatest challenge yet. Doctor Yang has perfected the technology that allows the cats to appear in their true form in the human world. Grace comes to learn of Shadow's past and the true meaning behind her destiny and the Nellaf.
author: Dale Cusack
